docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: This documentation provides an overview of the MkDocs project structure and features.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
• Installation: Follow the guide to install dependencies.
  • Building the site: Use 'mkdocs build' to generate static files.
  • Live preview: Run 'mkdocs serve' to see changes locally.

docs.title: Project Structure
docs.text:
• mkdocs.yml - Configuration file
  • docs/ - Contains all documentation markdown files
  • site/ - Generated static site (after build)

docs.title: Setup Guide
docs.text: Follow these steps to set up your environment.
